description: It's a beautiful day in the morning for Justin Ryder.  He's all by himself and has been looking forward to spending some alone time...so he can jack off, of course!  For some reason Justin's morning wood just wouldn't go away and his cock desperately needed some attention.  Watch Justin stroke it while on the patio furniture, the move over by the big coy fish statue.  It almost looks like the fish is trying to suck his balls!  This is a must-see jerk off session, performed by a man who knows how to get down with his bad self. Enjoy!
title: Justin Ryder
